issue.title: sandia hand meshes are not installed as valid gazebo model resources

content.raw: I switched visuals in sandia\_hand\_simple\_meshes to use mesh visuals, need to switch back to simple geometry visual before merging if this is a good enough solution.

issue.title: sandia hand meshes are not installed as valid gazebo model resources

content.raw: if we put the meshes in this location, is there any reason to keep them in the prior location as well?    (  share/sandia-hand-version/ros/sandia_hand_description/meshes  ) ? It seems we can toast them from the "meshes" install location and only install them into share/sandia-hand-version/ros/sandia_hand_description/gazebo/sandia_hand_description/meshes    ?
content.html: if we put the meshes in this location, is there any reason to keep them in the prior location as well? ( share/sandia-hand-version/ros/sandia_hand_description/meshes ) ? It seems we can toast them from the "meshes" install location and only install them into share/sandia-hand-version/ros/sandia_hand_description/gazebo/sandia_hand_description/meshes ?

issue.title: sandia hand meshes are not installed as valid gazebo model resources

content.raw:
that'll fix the gazebo model and mesh, but then the exported rospackage sandia\_hand\_description has [invalid references to meshes](#!/osrf/sandia-hand/src/a0ba2b5fa320e66327473d7090e809742c35fbf6/ros/sandia_hand_description/urdf/sandia_hand.urdf.xacro?at=default#cl-36)?  Although the source is a valid ros package.  I am confused.

This is one reason we switched gazebo's model manifest file to `model.config`, so we can re-use the same package for both ros and gazebo, where the package base contains both ros `manifest.xml` and gazebo `model.config`.  But I need to change my pull request around.  Thoughts?
content.html:
that'll fix the gazebo model and mesh, but then the exported rospackage sandia_hand_description has invalid references to meshes? Although the source is a valid ros package. I am confused.

This is one reason we switched gazebo's model manifest file to model.config, so we can re-use the same package for both ros and gazebo, where the package base contains both ros manifest.xml and gazebo model.config. But I need to change my pull request around. Thoughts?
